鸞翔鳳翥.definition: (of calligraphy) full of power and grace

鸞翔鳳集.definition: lit. firebird and phoenix come together (idiom); fig. a gathering of eminent people

鸞飄鳳泊.definition: lit. firebird soars, phoenix alights (idiom); fig. bold, graceful calligraphy; married couple separated from each other; talented person not given the opportunity to fulfill his potential

鸞鳳.definition: luan and phoenix; husband and wife; virtuous person; sovereign; belle
